name: 司潔妮
objective:
課程重點：(1) 藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2) 使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3) 熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4) 透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through reading materials appropriate to their levels; (2) to develop reading skill by giving explanation of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as analysis of basic writing skill; (3) to  familiarize students with useful expressions in conversation and build up their confidence in cross-cultural communication; (4) to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.
schedule:
Week 1: Course overview & Getting to Know Each Other
- Activities: Self-introductions, Ice-breaker games, pair discussions
- Task: Write a brief paragraph about yourself.

Week 2: Presentation Skills
- Activities: Group work & discussions
- Task: make a presentation about your favorite topic.

Week 3-4: Making New Friends
- Reading: Does birth order determine personality?
- Grammar & Quiz: Gerunds & infinitives
- Activities: Pair practice, topic discussions
- Task: Write a paragraph describing a good friend or a soul mate
- Presentation Skills

Week 5-6: Sharing Life Experiences 
- Reading: The ways we greet each other
- Grammar & Quiz: the simple pst & the present perfect
- Activities: Pair practice, topic discussions
- Task: Write about a memorable experience
- Presentation Skills

Week 7: Keys to Success
- Activities: Group work & discussions
- Task: Deliver a speech

Week 8-9: Midterm Project 

Week 10-11: Talking about Movies
- Reading: What is it about our favorite movies?
- Grammar & Quiz: the present perfect-other uses
- Activities: Pair practice, topic discussions
- Task: Write a two-paragraph review of a movie
- Presentation Skills

Week 12-13: Away from Home
- Reading: H2H (MyHouse = YourHotel)
- Grammar & Quiz: the future with "will" and "be going to"
- Activities: Pair practice, What Will They Do?
- Task: Write a review of one kind of accommodation
- Presentation Skills

Week 14: Oral practice
- Activities: Group work & discussions
- Task: Create a podcast show

Week 15-16: Looking Good
- Reading: Teens Anonymous
- Grammar & Quiz: Quantifiers for indefinite quantities and amounts
- Activities: Pair practice, topic discussions
- Task: Write a letter of response to someone asking for advice
- Presentation Skills

Week 17-18: Final Project
scorePolicy:
* 選修本課程，請務必準時到班上課。
20% School-wide English Proficiency Exam
80% Class Performance, including:
 - Midterm Presentation: 15%
 - Final Presentation: 15%
 - Attendance: 20% (-5% for each absence)
 - Participation, Quizzes, and Assignments: 30%

* Any student who accumulates FIVE unexcused absences in the semester class will receive a no-credit status. 無故缺席 5 次，即無法獲得本課程學分。
